title: All the best Apple deals this Amazon Prime Day [Still going!]
description: We'll show you the best Amazon Prime Day deals on Apple gear, from AirPods to iPads to MacBooks to the Studio Display. And Beats, too. (via Cult of Mac - Your source for the latest Apple news, rumors, analysis, reviews, how-tos and deals.)
author: D. Griffin Jones
excerpt: We'll show you the best Amazon Prime Day deals on Apple gear, from AirPods to iPads to MacBooks to the Studio Display. And Beats, too.
text: Deals All the best Apple gear at a steep discount — right here. Image: D. Griffin Jones/Cult of Mac It’s that time of year again — Amazon Prime Day. The summer deals run from July 8 – 11. So the early deals flowed starting over the weekend, with the full-on sale hitting with even better deals on Tuesday through Friday. We’ll show you the best Amazon Prime Day deals on Apple gear, from AirPods to iPads to MacBooks to the Studio Display. And that includes Apple audio subsidiary Beats, too. Click on the links below, and return to this page often — deals are subject to change, often for the better, and we’ll add more as we find them. This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items. Amazon keeps updating deals through Tuesday through Friday. And take note, if you prefer Best Buy, it’s matching many Apple deals. Table of Contents: Accessories AirPods Beats AirTag Apple Pencil Apple Watch iPad iPad iPad mini iPad Air iPad Pro Keyboard cases iPhone cases Mac MacBook Air MacBook Pro Mac mini iMac MagSafe Charger Studio Display Prime Day deals on Apple accessories Prime Day deals on AirPods Most affordable AirPods AirPods 4 Apple redesigned AirPods 4 for exceptional all-day comfort and greater stability. It features the Apple-designed H2 chip with Voice Isolation that improves the quality of phone calls in loud conditions.This version does not include active noise cancellation, but Apple does offer AirPods 4 with ANC for a slightly higher price. Pros:Most affordable AirPodsExcellent sound qualityUSB-C wireless charging case Cons:No active noise cancellation AirPods Max headphones (USB-C) in Midnight, Starlight, Purple, Orange and Blue — $549 $429.99 ($119.01 off, or 22%) AirPods Pro (2nd generation) earbuds — $249 $149 ($100 off, or 40%) AirPods (3rd generation) earbuds — $169 $133.98 ($35 off, or 20%) Beats headphones, earbuds and speakers Excellent entry-level ear buds Beats Solo Buds The Beats Solo Buds delivers 18 hours of battery life and works with Android and iPhone. Its carrying case is also the smallest ever designed by Beats. Pros:AffordableLong battery lifeSuper small charging case Cons:Limited featuresCharging cable is not bundled Compact cans with big sound Beats Solo 4 On-Ear Headphones Pros:50 hours battery lifePersonalized Spatial AudioApple and Android compatibleLossless audio over cable Cons:No active noise cancellation Beats Studio Pro wireless noise-canceling headphones — $349.99 $169.95 ($180 off, or 51%) Beats Studio Pro headphones in Kim Kardashian colors (dune, earth, brown and moon) — $349.99 $169.95 ($180 off, or 51%) Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds: orange, purple, white or black — $198.95 ($80.04 off) Beats Studio Buds+ wireless earbuds: black, silver, ivory or transparent colors — $89.95 ($80 off) Beats Flex Wireless Earbuds: black, blue, gray and yellow colors — $69.95 $49.49 ($20 off, or 29%) Beats Pill Bluetooth Speaker: gold, black, red, gray — $149.95 $97.95 ($51 off, or 35%) Find other great Prime Day deals on portable speakers. AirTag Apple AirTag 1 pack — $29 $19.99 ($9 off, or 31%) Apple Pencil Apple Pencil USB-C — $79 $59 ($20 off, or 25%) Apple Pencil (2nd Generation) — $129 $89.97 ($39 off, or 30%) Make sure that whichever Pencil you buy is compatible with your iPad. Apple Watch Thinnest, lightest yet Apple Watch Series 10 [GPS, 42mm] The Apple Watch Series 10 sports a sleek new design with a slimmer chassis, a bigger display and a faster chip. The build quality is also better than before. Pros:Sleek, stunning designBright displayFast charging Cons:Battery life does not last 24 hours. Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 40mm] Smartwatch with Aluminum Case, Midnight case with Ink Sport Loop and Starlight case with Lake Green Sport Loop — $249 $189 ($60 off, or 24%) Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 44mm] Smartwatch with Aluminum Case, various color combinations — $279 (not yet on sale) Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Dark Green Alpine Loop — $799 (not on sale yet) Prime Day deals on iPad Best budget tablet Apple iPad 11 with A16 chip (2025 model) Apple's entry-level tablet gets a solid upgrade, with a welcome boost to the base model's storage. It's a great option for watching videos, checking emails, surfing the web and more. Pros:A16 processorUltra Wide 12MP front camera supports Center StageStorage starts at 128GB Cons:Does not support Apple Intelligence. iPad (10th Generation): with A14 Bionic chip, 10.9-inch Liquid Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi 6, 12MP front/12MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Pink — $349 $299 ($50 off, or 14%) iPad (9th Generation): with A13 Bionic chip, 10.2-inch Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi, 12MP front/8MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Silver — $329 (SOLD OUT)  iPad mini Tiny tablet with big talents iPad mini 7 (2024) iPad mini 7 is tiny but boasts an 8.3-inch screen. iPadOS makes it a powerful computer, and it beats even the largest iPhone for watching video or playing games. Pros:So very portableGreat ebook reader iPad Mini (6th Generation): with A15 Bionic chip, 8.3-inch Liquid Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi 6, 12MP front/12MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Starlight — $499 $453.49 ($46 off, or 9%) iPad Air Power and efficiency M3 iPad Air (11-inch, 2025) The midrange iPad is the perfect all-around tablet for students, work and casual living room use. Pair with the Magic Keyboard for a laptop-style keyboard and trackpad. Works with Apple Pencil (USB-C) and Apple Pencil Pro. Pros:Powerful, desktop-class M3 chipLightweight, all-screen designOptional keyboard and Apple Pencil accessories Cons:Does not have Face ID M3 iPad Air (13-inch, 2025), Liquid Retina Display, 128GB, 12MP Front/Back Camera, Wi-Fi 6E, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life: Starlight, Blue, Purple, Space Gray — $799 $679 ($120 off, or 15%) iPad Pro Apple’s best selling tablet M4 iPad Pro (11-Inch, 2024) 5.0 iPad Pro is Apple’s most powerful, with the best-looking display. It’s a no-compromises tablet for those ready to get things done. Pros:Gorgeous screenAs powerful as a MacBook M4 iPad Pro: Ultra Retina XDR Display, 1TB, 12MP Front/Back Camera, LiDAR Scanner, Wi-Fi 6E, Face ID, All-Day Battery Life — Space Black — $1,599 $1,439 ($160 off, or 10%) Top tablet M4 iPad Pro (13-Inch, 2024) Built for Apple Intelligence, Apple's top tablet features an Ultra Retina XDR Display, 1TB SSD, 12MP front/back camera, LiDAR Scanner, Wi-Fi 6E + 5G Cellular, Face ID, all-day battery life and more. Pros:Thin and lightBeautiful displayAll-day battery life M4 iPad Pro: Ultra Retina XDR Display, 1TB, 12MP Front/Back Camera, LiDAR Scanner, Wi-Fi 6E, Face ID, All-Day Battery Life — Silver — $1,899 $1,699 ($200 off, or 11%) iPad keyboard cases iPad Magic Keyboard Case for iPad Pro 11-inch (M4) — $299 $243.99 ($55 off, or 18%) iPad Magic Keyboard Case for iPad Pro 13-inch (M4) — $349 $339.99 ($9 off, or 3%) iPhone cases (Apple) Apple’s official case Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max Silicone Case with MagSafe and Camera Control, all colors (discounts vary slightly) — $49 (not yet on sale) Prime Day deals on Mac MacBook Air So portable, so powerful M4 MacBook Air (13-inch, 2025) Powered by Apple's M4 chip, this 13-inch laptop delivers excellent performance and extreme efficiency in the same gorgeous design as last year's model. It packs two Thunderbolt 4 ports and a MagSafe connector for fast charging, with Wi-Fi 6E connectivity. It comes in four colors, including an interesting new sky blue. With Apple Intelligence, up to 18 hours of battery life, and an incredibly portable design, you can take on anything, anywhere. Pros:Slim and lightGorgeous 15-inch high-res screenPowerful M4 processor 13-inch MacBook Air with M4 chip: 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, 12MP Center Stage Camera, Touch ID; Midnight, Silver, Sky Blue, Starlight — $1,199 $1,049 ($150 off, or 13%) 15-inch MacBook Air with M4 chip: 24GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, 12MP Center Stage Camera, Touch ID; Midnight, Silver, Sky Blue, Starlight — $1,599 $1,424.50 ($174.50 off, or 11%) Prime Day deals on MacBook Pro 14-inch MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 Apple's midrange laptop fits a colorful 120Hz display, acres of space with 1 TB storage and 24GB memory, and all-day battery life in a compact size. Pros:Compact 14-inch sizeLiquid Retina XDR displayPlenty of ports Cons:Same M4 chip as MacBook Air Apple's largest laptop 16-inch MacBook Pro with M4 Pro 4.5 Apple's flagship laptop packs a roomy 16-inch 120Hz display, powerful internals with 24GB memory, and all-day battery life. Pros:M4 Pro chip is powerful and efficientGorgeous screen Cons:Same (great) design as previous models M4 chip 14-inch MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 chip: 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $1,599 $1,429.00 ($170 off, or 11%) 14-inch MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 chip: 16GB Unified Memory, 1TB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $1,799 $1,623.89 ($175 off, or 10%) 14-inch MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 chip: 24GB Unified Memory, 1TB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $1,999 $1,749 ($250 off, or 13%) M4 Pro chip 14-inch MacBook Pro laptop Laptop with M4 Pro chip: 24GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black — $1,999 $1,749 ($250 off, or 13%) M4 Max chip 14-inch MacBook Pro with M4 Max: 36GB Unified Memory, 1TB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $3,199 $2,874.21 ($324.79 off, or 10%) 16-inch MacBook Pro with M4 Max: 36GB Unified Memory, 1TB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $3,499 $3,149 ($350 off, or 10%) Mac mini Mini but mighty! 2024 M4 Mac mini Apple's tiny new desktop features an M4 chip with 10‑core CPU and 10‑core GPU "built for Apple Intelligence," plus 16GB unified memory, 256GB SSD storage and Gigabit Ethernet. Pros:Latest M4 chip for great performanceSeven color options, with color-matched accessories24-inch 4.5K display looks great Cons:Limited number of ports 2024 iMac with M4 chip with 24GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage; Silver, Blue, Green, Pink — $1,899 $1,715.28 ($183.72 off, or 10%) MagSafe Charger MagSafe Charger (1m) — $39 $32.99 ($6 off, or 15%) MagSafe Charger (2m) — $49 $39.99 ($9 off, or 18%) Studio Display Apple Studio Display The 27-inch Apple Studio Display packs an impressive panel coupled with a six-speaker system and studio-quality microphones. We first published this post on October 7, 2024, with early Prime Day deals and then republished it with more deals and updates on October 8, 2024, October 9, 2024 and October 10, 2024.
html:
• Deals

It’s that time of year again — Amazon Prime Day. The summer deals run from July 8 – 11. So the early deals flowed starting over the weekend, with the full-on sale hitting with even better deals on Tuesday through Friday.

We’ll show you the best Amazon Prime Day deals on Apple gear, from AirPods to iPads to MacBooks to the Studio Display. And that includes Apple audio subsidiary Beats, too. Click on the links below, and return to this page often — deals are subject to change, often for the better, and we’ll add more as we find them.

This post contains affiliate links. Cult of Mac may earn a commission when you use our links to buy items.

Amazon keeps updating deals through Tuesday through Friday. And take note, if you prefer Best Buy, it’s matching many Apple deals.

Table of Contents:

  1. Accessories
    1. AirPods
    2. Beats
    3. AirTag
    4. Apple Pencil
  2. Apple Watch
  3. iPad
    1. iPad
    2. iPad mini
    3. iPad Air
    4. iPad Pro
    5. Keyboard cases
  4. iPhone cases
  5. Mac
    1. MacBook Air
    2. MacBook Pro
    3. Mac mini
    4. iMac
    5. MagSafe Charger
    6. Studio Display

Prime Day deals on Apple accessories

Prime Day deals on AirPods

Most affordable AirPods

AirPods 4

Apple redesigned AirPods 4 for exceptional all-day comfort and greater stability. It features the Apple-designed H2 chip with Voice Isolation that improves the quality of phone calls in loud conditions.

This version does not include active noise cancellation, but Apple does offer AirPods 4 with ANC for a slightly higher price.

Pros:

  • Most affordable AirPods
  • Excellent sound quality
  • USB-C wireless charging case

Cons:

  • No active noise cancellation

  • AirPods Max headphones (USB-C) in Midnight, Starlight, Purple, Orange and Blue — $549 $429.99 ($119.01 off, or 22%)
  • AirPods Pro (2nd generation) earbuds — $249 $149 ($100 off, or 40%)
  • AirPods (3rd generation) earbuds — $169 $133.98 ($35 off, or 20%)

Beats headphones, earbuds and speakers

Excellent entry-level ear buds

Beats Solo Buds

The Beats Solo Buds delivers 18 hours of battery life and works with Android and iPhone. Its carrying case is also the smallest ever designed by Beats.

Pros:

  • Affordable
  • Long battery life
  • Super small charging case

Cons:

  • Limited features
  • Charging cable is not bundled

Compact cans with big sound

Beats Solo 4 On-Ear Headphones

Pros:

  • 50 hours battery life
  • Personalized Spatial Audio
  • Apple and Android compatible
  • Lossless audio over cable

Cons:

  • No active noise cancellation

  • Beats Studio Pro wireless noise-canceling headphones — $349.99 $169.95 ($180 off, or 51%)
  • Beats Studio Pro headphones in Kim Kardashian colors (dune, earth, brown and moon) — $349.99 $169.95 ($180 off, or 51%)
  • Beats Powerbeats Pro 2 Wireless Earbuds: orange, purple, white or black — $198.95 ($80.04 off)
  • Beats Studio Buds+ wireless earbuds: black, silver, ivory or transparent colors — $89.95 ($80 off)
  • Beats Flex Wireless Earbuds: black, blue, gray and yellow colors — $69.95 $49.49 ($20 off, or 29%)
  • Beats Pill Bluetooth Speaker: gold, black, red, gray — $149.95 $97.95 ($51 off, or 35%)
  • Find other great Prime Day deals on portable speakers.

AirTag

  • Apple AirTag 1 pack — $29 $19.99 ($9 off, or 31%)

Apple Pencil

  • Apple Pencil USB-C — $79 $59 ($20 off, or 25%)
  • Apple Pencil (2nd Generation) — $129 $89.97 ($39 off, or 30%)

Make sure that whichever Pencil you buy is compatible with your iPad.

Apple Watch

Thinnest, lightest yet

Apple Watch Series 10 [GPS, 42mm]

The Apple Watch Series 10 sports a sleek new design with a slimmer chassis, a bigger display and a faster chip. The build quality is also better than before.

Pros:

  • Sleek, stunning design
  • Bright display
  • Fast charging

Cons:

  • Battery life does not last 24 hours.

  • Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 40mm] Smartwatch with Aluminum Case, Midnight case with Ink Sport Loop and Starlight case with Lake Green Sport Loop — $249 $189 ($60 off, or 24%)
  • Apple Watch SE (2nd Gen) [GPS 44mm] Smartwatch with Aluminum Case, various color combinations — $279 (not yet on sale)
  • Apple Watch Ultra 2 [GPS + Cellular 49mm] Smartwatch, Sport Watch with Black Titanium Case with Dark Green Alpine Loop — $799 (not on sale yet)

Prime Day deals on iPad

Best budget tablet

Apple iPad 11 with A16 chip (2025 model)

Apple's entry-level tablet gets a solid upgrade, with a welcome boost to the base model's storage. It's a great option for watching videos, checking emails, surfing the web and more.

Pros:

  • A16 processor
  • Ultra Wide 12MP front camera supports Center Stage
  • Storage starts at 128GB

Cons:

  • Does not support Apple Intelligence.

  • iPad (10th Generation): with A14 Bionic chip, 10.9-inch Liquid Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi 6, 12MP front/12MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Pink — $349 $299 ($50 off, or 14%)
  • iPad (9th Generation): with A13 Bionic chip, 10.2-inch Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi, 12MP front/8MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Silver — $329 (SOLD OUT)

 iPad mini

Tiny tablet with big talents

iPad mini 7 (2024)

iPad mini 7 is tiny but boasts an 8.3-inch screen. iPadOS makes it a powerful computer, and it beats even the largest iPhone for watching video or playing games.

Pros:

  • So very portable
  • Great ebook reader

  • iPad Mini (6th Generation): with A15 Bionic chip, 8.3-inch Liquid Retina Display, 64GB, Wi-Fi 6, 12MP front/12MP Back Camera, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life – Starlight — $499 $453.49 ($46 off, or 9%)

iPad Air

Power and efficiency

M3 iPad Air (11-inch, 2025)

The midrange iPad is the perfect all-around tablet for students, work and casual living room use.

Pair with the Magic Keyboard for a laptop-style keyboard and trackpad. Works with Apple Pencil (USB-C) and Apple Pencil Pro.

Pros:

  • Powerful, desktop-class M3 chip
  • Lightweight, all-screen design
  • Optional keyboard and Apple Pencil accessories

Cons:

  • Does not have Face ID

  • M3 iPad Air (13-inch, 2025), Liquid Retina Display, 128GB, 12MP Front/Back Camera, Wi-Fi 6E, Touch ID, All-Day Battery Life: Starlight, Blue, Purple, Space Gray — $799 $679 ($120 off, or 15%)

iPad Pro

Apple’s best selling tablet

M4 iPad Pro (11-Inch, 2024)

5.0

iPad Pro is Apple’s most powerful, with the best-looking display. It’s a no-compromises tablet for those ready to get things done.

Pros:

  • Gorgeous screen
  • As powerful as a MacBook

  • M4 iPad Pro: Ultra Retina XDR Display, 1TB, 12MP Front/Back Camera, LiDAR Scanner, Wi-Fi 6E, Face ID, All-Day Battery Life — Space Black — $1,599 $1,439 ($160 off, or 10%)

Top tablet

M4 iPad Pro (13-Inch, 2024)

Built for Apple Intelligence, Apple's top tablet features an Ultra Retina XDR Display, 1TB SSD, 12MP front/back camera, LiDAR Scanner, Wi-Fi 6E + 5G Cellular, Face ID, all-day battery life and more.

Pros:

  • Thin and light
  • Beautiful display
  • All-day battery life

  • M4 iPad Pro: Ultra Retina XDR Display, 1TB, 12MP Front/Back Camera, LiDAR Scanner, Wi-Fi 6E, Face ID, All-Day Battery Life — Silver — $1,899 $1,699 ($200 off, or 11%)

iPad keyboard cases

  • iPad Magic Keyboard Case for iPad Pro 11-inch (M4) — $299 $243.99 ($55 off, or 18%)
  • iPad Magic Keyboard Case for iPad Pro 13-inch (M4) — $349 $339.99 ($9 off, or 3%)

iPhone cases (Apple)

Apple’s official case

  • Apple iPhone 16 Pro Max Silicone Case with MagSafe and Camera Control, all colors (discounts vary slightly) — $49 (not yet on sale)

Prime Day deals on Mac

MacBook Air

So portable, so powerful

M4 MacBook Air (13-inch, 2025)

Powered by Apple's M4 chip, this 13-inch laptop delivers excellent performance and extreme efficiency in the same gorgeous design as last year's model. It packs two Thunderbolt 4 ports and a MagSafe connector for fast charging, with Wi-Fi 6E connectivity. It comes in four colors, including an interesting new sky blue.

Pros:

  • Outstanding Apple design
  • 18-hour battery life
  • Supports Apple Intelligence

Sleek and speedy

M4 MacBook Air (15-inch 2025)

5.0

MacBook Air with the M4 chip lets you blaze through work and play. With Apple Intelligence, up to 18 hours of battery life, and an incredibly portable design, you can take on anything, anywhere.

Pros:

  • Slim and light
  • Gorgeous 15-inch high-res screen
  • Powerful M4 processor

  • 13-inch MacBook Air with M4 chip: 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, 12MP Center Stage Camera, Touch ID; Midnight, Silver, Sky Blue, Starlight — $1,199 $1,049 ($150 off, or 13%)
  • 15-inch MacBook Air with M4 chip: 24GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, 12MP Center Stage Camera, Touch ID; Midnight, Silver, Sky Blue, Starlight — $1,599 $1,424.50 ($174.50 off, or 11%)

Prime Day deals on MacBook Pro

14-inch MacBook Pro Laptop with M4

Apple's midrange laptop fits a colorful 120Hz display, acres of space with 1 TB storage and 24GB memory, and all-day battery life in a compact size.

Pros:

  • Compact 14-inch size
  • Liquid Retina XDR display
  • Plenty of ports

Cons:

  • Same M4 chip as MacBook Air

Apple's largest laptop

16-inch MacBook Pro with M4 Pro

4.5

Apple's flagship laptop packs a roomy 16-inch 120Hz display, powerful internals with 24GB memory, and all-day battery life.

Pros:

  • M4 Pro chip is powerful and efficient
  • Gorgeous screen

Cons:

  • Same (great) design as previous models

M4 chip

  • 14-inch MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 chip: 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $1,599 $1,429.00 ($170 off, or 11%)
  • 14-inch MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 chip: 16GB Unified Memory, 1TB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $1,799 $1,623.89 ($175 off, or 10%)
  • 14-inch MacBook Pro Laptop with M4 chip: 24GB Unified Memory, 1TB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $1,999 $1,749 ($250 off, or 13%)

M4 Pro chip

  • 14-inch MacBook Pro laptop Laptop with M4 Pro chip: 24GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black — $1,999 $1,749 ($250 off, or 13%)

M4 Max chip

  • 14-inch MacBook Pro with M4 Max: 36GB Unified Memory, 1TB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $3,199 $2,874.21 ($324.79 off, or 10%)
  • 16-inch MacBook Pro with M4 Max: 36GB Unified Memory, 1TB SSD Storage; Silver or Space Black $3,499 $3,149 ($350 off, or 10%)

Mac mini

Mini but mighty!

2024 M4 Mac mini

Apple's tiny new desktop features an M4 chip with 10‑core CPU and 10‑core GPU "built for Apple Intelligence," plus 16GB unified memory, 256GB SSD storage and Gigabit Ethernet.

Pros:

  • Apple M4 chip is powerful
  • Compact desktop design

Cons:

  • Headphone jack on front
  • BYODKM (bring your own display, keyboard and mouse)

  • 2024 Mac mini with M4 Pro chip: 24GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage, Gigabit Ethernet — $1,399 $1,261.43 ($137.57 off, or 10%)

iMac

All-in-one dream machine

2024 M4 iMac

4.0

Colorful and capable, Apple's refreshed all-in-one desktop computer is fun and functional.

Pros:

  • Latest M4 chip for great performance
  • Seven color options, with color-matched accessories
  • 24-inch 4.5K display looks great

Cons:

  • Limited number of ports

  • 2024 iMac with M4 chip with 24GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage; Silver, Blue, Green, Pink — $1,899 $1,715.28 ($183.72 off, or 10%)

MagSafe Charger

  • MagSafe Charger (1m) — $39 $32.99 ($6 off, or 15%)
  • MagSafe Charger (2m) — $49 $39.99 ($9 off, or 18%)

Studio Display

Apple Studio Display

The 27-inch Apple Studio Display packs an impressive panel coupled with a six-speaker system and studio-quality microphones.

It’s not as beautiful as Apple's Pro Display XDR, but the Studio Display costs thousands less.

Pros:

  • Crystal clear 5K resolution
  • Excellent color accuracy
  • 12MP Center Stage camera

Cons:

  • Expensive
  • Lacks HDR
  • Height-adjustable stand costs extra

  • Studio Display – Nano-Texture Glass – Tilt- and Height-Adjustable Stand ​​​​​​​– $2,299 (not yet on sale)
  • See more great external display deals for Prime Day.

We first published this post on October 7, 2024, with early Prime Day deals and then republished it with more deals and updates on October 8, 2024, October 9, 2024 and October 10, 2024.
